Module jakarta.nosql.core

Package jakarta.nosql

package jakarta.nosql
Defines the core API in mapping level. It brings an easy interface to support NoSQL databases using as base Jakarta NoSQL. The API's focus is on simplicity and ease of use. Developers should only have to know a minimal set of artifacts to work with the solution. The API is built on latest Java 8 features and therefore fit perfectly with the functional features of Java 8.
